text:
心の音がチクタク 走り出したようで
期待や不安を胸に抱き抱えてあなたのすぐ側まで
何千何万と過ぎていく日々も
宝石のように笑いあった日々も
いつか失って立ち竦んでしまう日々も
歯止めは効かぬ時のワルツ
今日だって
変わり変わる風景
神秘的な偶然
回り回る運命
混ざり交ざってそうやってまた過ぎ去ってしまうもので
trans:
The ticking sound of my heart feels as though it's starting to race
Carrying both anticipation and anxiety, I come close to your side
The countless days that pass by
The days we laughed together like jewels
The days we may someday lose and find ourselves frozen in place
The waltz of time that cannot be stopped
Even today
The ever-changing scenery
The mysterious coincidences
The spinning, intertwining fate
They all mix together and once again fade away
